702192f-a.text:
This house is 355 East 194th Street, between Marion Avenue and Decatur Avenue in the Bronx, NY.

I grew up in that house. It had 17 private garages in the back and two massive gardens, one including a peach tree that bore fruit.

The house was a 3 family house, with a full basement, attic, and a dumbwaiter.  The home had one fireplace, with a marble mantel.

I believe the home was leveled in 2012 or so to build a home for the Veterans Administration.

Camille DeSantis
